How can you even sympathize with a character whose pea-sized brain only recognised word is "oppai"? Take out that particular quirk and he is basically a nobody. Fanboys just adore him because they can relate to his uselessness. His ascension to power just involves random bs of deus ex machina moments. Can hardly even do pushups ffs. But no surprises there, Ishibumi for the life of him cannot even device a decent plot, much less a convincing main character. Not that it matters since this is an ecchi comedy. The show is for laughs just like how the mc is laughable. Make more of this author-san, perhaps with Azazel as your mc lol

After seeing his friends and first true love be taken away from him, Issei.....Left. Kiba shortly after leaning about it all, also left. Neither could deal with such a loss. When he saw his only hope at asserting his revenge upon the church become a slave, Kiba became depressed. Several days later, he committed suicide publicly and placed the blame on Rider for taking away his only chance. Issei? He went back to his life. Without arias in her right state of mind, he wasn’t bound to her anymore, which saddened him. Although he went back to his life before the ORC, it wasn’t the same. When the Chaos brigade finally arrived to take down the three races, no one could stop them. The first clan to fall was Phenex. The rest of the devils were quick to take pity seeing as his house were nothing more than sluts, Riser himself being an utter imbecile. They called for Issei knowing he had the Red Dragon within him, but he refused immediately. Shortly after, the three races fell into ruin.
